item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Installation Prerequisites abqpy supports Python 3.7 or a later version. If you are using Python 3.6 or an earlier version, please upgrade to Python 3.7 or a later version. Install with pip abqpy is uploaded to PyPI, you can simply install it using pip: pip install abqpy Install with conda abqpy is also uploaded to anaconda, you can use conda to install it: conda install -c haiiliin abqpy Install from source You may install the latest development version by cloning the GitHub repository and use python to install from the local directory:
